articles.author: Kirsten Korosec
articles.title: An AI model from over a decade ago sparked Nvidia’s investment in autonomous vehicles - TechCrunch
articles.description: According to Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang, AlexNet, an AI model from over a decade ago, is what sparked the company's investment in autonomous vehicles.
articles.content:
Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang’s keynote Tuesday at the company’s GTC 2025 conference stuck with tradition and was chock-full of announcements. But the company also snuck in a little history lesson.
During… [+1872 chars]

articles.author: James Archer
articles.title: PCIe 5.0 SSDs are growing up, but ye olde 4.0 drives are still better value for gaming PCs - Rock Paper Shotgun
articles.description: While the Samsung 9100 Pro marks a new technical high for PCIe 5.0 SSDs, their gaming performance remains on par with cheaper PCIe 4.0 storage.
articles.content: Two years since the first gaming-focused PCIe 5.0 SSDs showed up, there are some encouraging signs that these drives might eventually develop something approaching a point. Consider the Crucial T700,… [+3948 chars]
